title: RENAME IVERN RIOT THIS IS IMPORTANT @RIOT YOU NEED TO READ ABSOLUTELY
body:
french traduction for Iver the green father is :

Ivern Le Père Vert

But if you read it it sounds exactly like this in french :

Ivern The Pervert

hahahaha nice one Riot looks like some lulu are going to be *****

replies.body:
looks at his teaser trailer... joked he seemed date rapey....
BILL COSBY the champ?
Wouldn't they be able to easily avoid this by making him "Ivern le père de vert" or "the father of green" in french?
sounds like perdvert from parks and rec lol

I don't get why they don't just call him Friend of the Forest.

Ivern, l'Ami de la Forêt

It describes him far better too imo.

Ivern le Père Vert....seems appropriate.

Specially since he is voiced by David LODGE...aka Pervy Sage Jiraiya.

Good to have a perverted champion then.

GJ Rito.
E-vern Damnnnn das some french name. Escuse me can i have yo number?

Haha ivern le pervers !
Riot should take good notice of this post tho before it goes like graves when he lost his cigar.
I can't stop laughing at this!
